title: Sequences of two short DNA fragments

content.prompt: The sequences for two short fragments of DNA are shown above. Which of the following is one way in which these two segments would differ?

choices.label: Segment 1 would not code for mRNA because both strands have T, a base not found in RNA.
Segment 1 would be more soluble in water than segment 2 because it has more phosphate groups.
Segment 1 would become denatured at a lower temperature than would segment 2 because A-T base pairs have two hydrogen bonds whereas G-C base pairs have three.
Segment 1 must be from a prokaryote because it has predominantly A-T base pairs.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
